alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 1:01PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Isolated to scattered power outages are expected. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two periods of strong winds are expected, the first between 1 PM and 4 PM on Thursday, followed by the second window from 9 PM and 2 AM on Thursday night, before winds weaken by sunrise.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
